verses.verse: Children, <S%G5043><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> your parents <S%G1118><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> is right. <S%G1342><s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother <S%G3384><s%> (which <S%G3748><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> with a promise <S%G1860><s%>),
that it may be well <S%G2095><s%> with you, and that you may live <S%G3118><s%> long <S%G3118><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And, fathers, <S%G3962><s%> do not provoke <S%G3949><s%> your children <S%G5043><s%> to anger; <S%G3949><s%> but bring <S%G1625><s%> them up in the discipline <S%G3809><s%> and instruction <S%G3559><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Slaves, <S%G1401><s%> be obedient <S%G5219><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are your masters <S%G2962><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and trembling, <S%G5156><s%> in the sincerity <S%G572><s%> of your heart, <S%G2588><s%> as to Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

not by way <S%G2596><s%> of eyeservice, <S%G3787><s%> as men-pleasers, but as slaves <S%G1401><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from the heart. <S%G5590><s%>
With good <S%G2133><s%> will <S%G2133><s%> render <S%G1398><s%> service, <S%G1398><s%> as to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and not to men, <S%G444><s%>

knowing <S%G3609><s%> that whatever <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5100><s%> good <S%G18><s%> thing <S%G18><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> does, <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> he will receive <S%G2865><s%> back <S%G2865><s%> from the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free. <S%G1658><s%>

And, masters, <S%G2962><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things <S%G846><s%> to them, and give <S%G447><s%> up threatening, <S%G547><s%> knowing <S%G3609><s%> that both <S%G2532><s%> their Master <S%G2962><s%> and yours <S%G4771><s%> is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and there is no <S%G3756><s%> partiality <S%G4382><s%> with Him.
Finally, <S%G3062><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and in the strength <S%G2904><s%> of His might. <S%G2479><s%>

Put <S%G1746><s%> on the full <S%G3833><s%> armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> firm <S%G2476><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the schemes <S%G3180><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

For our struggle <S%G3823><s%> is not against <S%G4314><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> but against <S%G4314><s%> the rulers, <S%G746><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the powers, <S%G1849><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the world <S%G2888><s%> forces <S%G2888><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the spiritual <S%G4152><s%> [forces] of wickedness <S%G4189><s%> in the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> [places.]

Therefore, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> take <S%G353><s%> up the full <S%G3833><s%> armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to resist <S%G436><s%> in the evil <S%G4190><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and having done <S%G2716><s%> everything, <S%G537><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> firm. <S%G2476><s%>

Stand <S%G2476><s%> firm <S%G2476><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having girded <S%G4024><s%> your loins <S%G3751><s%> with truth, <S%G225><s%> and having put <S%G1746><s%> on the breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%>
and having shod <S%G5265><s%> your feet <S%G4228><s%> with the preparation <S%G2091><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of peace; <S%G1515><s%>

in addition to all, <S%G3956><s%> taking <S%G353><s%> up the shield <S%G2375><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> you will be able <S%G1410><s%> to extinguish <S%G4570><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the flaming <S%G4448><s%> missiles <S%G956><s%> of the evil <S%G4190><s%> [one.]

And take <S%G1209><s%> the helmet <S%G4030><s%> of salvation, <S%G4992><s%> and the sword <S%G3162><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is the word <S%G4487><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

With all <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> and petition <S%G1162><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> at all <S%G3956><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and with this <S%G846><s%> in view, <S%G1519><s%> be on the alert <S%G69><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance <S%G4343><s%> and petition <S%G1162><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the saints, <S%G40><s%>

and [pray] on my behalf, <S%G5228><s%> that utterance <S%G3056><s%> may be given <S%G1325><s%> to me in the opening <S%G457><s%> of my mouth, <S%G4750><s%> to make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> with boldness <S%G3954><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%>

for which <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G4243><s%> an ambassador <S%G4243><s%> in chains; <S%G254><s%> that in [proclaiming] it I may speak <S%G3955><s%> boldly, <S%G3955><s%> as I ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But that you also <S%G2532><s%> may know <S%G3609><s%> about <S%G2596><s%> my circumstances, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2596><s%> how <S%G5101><s%> I am doing, <S%G4238><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> will make <S%G1107><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you.

And I have sent <S%G3992><s%> him to you for this <S%G3778><s%> very <S%G846><s%> purpose, so <S%G2443><s%> that you may know <S%G1097><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> us, and that he may comfort <S%G3870><s%> your hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to the brethren, <S%G80><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> with faith, <S%G4102><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who love <S%G25><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> with [a love] incorruptible. <S%G861><s%>
